title: Tell us what you think! Res Lease in Austin. 1 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: Move in ready, second floor studio apartment!
Recently upgraded and located in the desirable Hyde Park area!
Less than 1 mile from the UT Shuttle and Metro Bus.
Washer and Dryer available on property in the community laundry room.
App available to make payments easier than having coins on you!
These recently updated units are going to fly off the market, so secure yours today!
*Tenant is responsible for setting up electricity, cable (if wanted) and internet on their own, while there will be a bill back for water, waste water, pest control and trash.
* $55 for utilities billed back monthly plus $12.50 for pest control not included in listing.
(Houses, Duplexes, Apartments, Condos, All Areas, All Prices)
PRICES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE DAILY/PICS MAY NOT REFLECT EXACT UNIT
